Articles.Content:
The Kerpollo side:

Bill: And we have docked!

Bob: Why were we chosen to do this mission?

Jenzer: Because you're always the prime crew for flights, and I filled in for Jeb after he..well...died in that plane crash.

The Koyuz side:

Neldion: I can't wait to shake hands with them!

Billy-Bobbles: Well we'll do that soon

Arbill: More like in one half-orbit.

One half-orbit later...

Bill to Neldion: It is a pleasure meeting with you.

Neldion to Bill: Indeed!

Billy-Bobbles to Bob: So, how's it going?

Bob to Billy-Bobbles: Not bad, except for my brother being dead.

Billy-Bobbles to Bob: Sad to hear.

Jenzer to Arbill: Hello!

Arbill to Jenzer: Hello to you too!

Jenzer to Arbill: We shall shake hands now!

*All of them shake hands with one another*

10 orbits later...

*BOOM*

Bill: What the hell was that!?

Bob: OH GOD

Jenzer: I don't know, but we lost our engine

Bill: Koyuz, Koyuz, do you read?

*static*

Bob: I don't see their craft outside the window!

-silence-

Jenzer: Their whole ship exploded!

Bob: And we have no engine to get back home!

Bill: Well, cra-

Kraken: I will kill you...

All of the Kerpollo Ship: NONONONONONONOOOOOOOOOOOOO----

Those were the last words of the Kerpollo-Koyuz Docking.

The whole Kerpollo ship died of the Kraken's tentacles.

Jebediah Kerman died in a plane crash during flight training due to a faulty landing system

The whole Koyuz ship died of explosions due to the Krakens influence

7 Eterno-Rest Coffins are set to launch into space, one for each crew meber who died on that day and Jebediah, the fearless space hero.

All 7 of them will be remembered.

This is my first story of may more to come. This was also based on a true event that happened in my KSP save. Feedback is always appreciated!
